mapper.select: SELECT n.*, (select typename from wkrj_sys_data_dictionary where id=n.accept_source) source,(select typename from wkrj_sys_data_dictionary where id=n.content_type) type, (select user_realname from wkrj_sys_user where user_id=n.input_user) user_realname,DATEDIFF(NOW(),DATE_SUB(input_time,INTERVAL -deal_days DAY)) remain_days, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(input_time,INTERVAL -deal_days DAY),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') daoqi_time, round((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(input_time,INTERVAL -deal_days DAY)))/3600) remain_hours, (select dept_name from wkrj_sys_department where dept_id=n.chengban_dept) dept_name,(select typename from wkrj_sys_data_dictionary where id=n.business_type) nature, DATE_FORMAT((select opt_time from wkrj_procedurerecord where event_id=n.event_id and opt_type=1 order by opt_time desc limit 1),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reply_time, (select opt_content from wkrj_procedurerecord where event_id=n.event_id and opt_type=1 order by opt_time desc limit 1) reply_content, (select opt_content from wkrj_procedurerecord where event_id=n.event_id and opt_type=2 order by opt_time desc limit 1) delay_reason, DATE_FORMAT((select opt_time from wkrj_procedurerecord where event_id=n.event_id and opt_type=2 order by opt_time desc limit 1),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') delay_time, DATE_FORMAT(n.input_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') event_inputtime,DATE_FORMAT(n.qianshou_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') qianshoutime FROM `wkrj_reportevent_wf` n order by event_inputtime desc
SELECT count(1) FROM `wkrj_reportevent_wf` n where n.event_no like concat("%", #{event_no},"%")

SELECT n.*, (select typename from wkrj_sys_data_dictionary where id=n.accept_source) source,(select typename from wkrj_sys_data_dictionary where id=n.content_type) type, (select user_realname from wkrj_sys_user where user_id=n.input_user) user_realname,DATEDIFF(NOW(),DATE_SUB(input_time,INTERVAL -deal_days DAY)) remain_days, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(input_time,INTERVAL -deal_days DAY),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') daoqi_time, round((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(input_time,INTERVAL -deal_days DAY)))/3600) remain_hours, (select dept_name from wkrj_sys_department where dept_id=n.chengban_dept) dept_name,(select typename from wkrj_sys_data_dictionary where id=n.business_type) nature, DATE_FORMAT((select opt_time from wkrj_procedurerecord where event_id=n.event_id and opt_type=1 order by opt_time desc limit 1),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reply_time, (select opt_content from wkrj_procedurerecord where event_id=n.event_id and opt_type=1 order by opt_time desc limit 1) reply_content, (select opt_content from wkrj_procedurerecord where event_id=n.event_id and opt_type=2 order by opt_time desc limit 1) delay_reason, DATE_FORMAT((select opt_time from wkrj_procedurerecord where event_id=n.event_id and opt_type=2 order by opt_time desc limit 1),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') delay_time, DATE_FORMAT(n.input_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') event_inputtime,DATE_FORMAT(n.qianshou_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') qianshoutime FROM `wkrj_reportevent_wf` n where n.event_id=#{event_id}

SELECT count(1) FROM `wkrj_reportevent_wf` n right join wkrj_procedurerecord d on n.event_id=d.event_id where 1=1 and n.event_status='延时'
and n.input_user = #{user_id}
SELECT d.*,o.* FROM wkrj_reportevent_wf e right JOIN wkrj_procedurerecord d ON e.event_id=d.event_id right JOIN wkrj_opinionfile_wf o ON d.opinionID=o.opinionID WHERE d.event_id=#{event_id}
mapper.update: update wkrj_reportevent_wf set qianshou_status=#{qianshou_status} where event_id=#{event_id}
update wkrj_reportevent_wf set cuiban_status=#{cuiban_status} where event_id=#{event_id}
update wkrj_reportevent_wf set event_status=#{event_status} where event_id=#{event_id}
update wkrj_reportevent_wf set shenhe_status=#{shenhe_status} where event_id=#{event_id}
update wkrj_reportevent_wf set zhuanbanornot=#{zhuanbanornot} where event_id=#{event_id}
update wkrj_reportevent_wf set satisfy_status=#{satisfy_status} where event_id=#{event_id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(event_id) FROM wkrj_reportevent_wf where event_id=#{event_id} and accept_dept=#{accept_dept}
